name: Keiba Eight '98 Haru Natsu
overview: Keiba Eito '98 Haru Natsu (also known as Keiba Eight '98 Haru Natsu) is the first game in the Keiba Eito series for the Playstation console, the first games of the series were released in the Super Nintendo console. In the game the player can only go through different stats of horses, places & jockeys. the game is heavy on japanese text, so only people that can fully understand japanese will like this game. The game features that stats and data results of the 1997-1998 season.
